tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Kaushal Malhan is such a patient doctor who gives a hearing ear to all the problems of a patient and recommends the best way out. He doesn't push patients for surgery but tries to heal the problems through various medical solutions 

But booking through practo didn't reduce my waiting time against the list of patients

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mom's both knee replacement@ her age 75 years, done by Dr. Kaushal Malhan on 15/10/2019. Result is Awesome. In one go, means only one anesthesia (to lower the risk).  No Blood loss, minimal invasive Surgery,  no muscle cut or damage, No Physiotherapy done. No pain. Our experience was Superb.  Awesome nature Doctor,  recommends operation ONLY IF NEEDED , listen patient's problem carefully and peacefully,  explains whole procedure in detail till post operation & recovery stage.
Initially, We have thought of taking another Doctor's opinion. But after consulting him, we were so satisfied,  we have no reason to take second opinion. I am writing this after 2 & half years. We are very happy with results,  so we are strongly recommending Dr. Kaushal Malhan for knee replacement surgery. Do watch his you tube videos for more details. Google search on his tissue preserving technic article.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
He listened about the issue very patiently and immediately gave remidy for improvement
Means he immediately understood my actual problem and gave solution
Doctor was friendly and helpful. He explained the present status and future remedies and options for recovery

My mother visited for joint pain and swelling in wrinkle, doctor understand the problem very well and give ****** medicine and informed about exercise. 

Thanks 
Amiya Pandey
He has lot of experience in this field. His approach is very good. Professional attitude and very polite

********* ****** *** **** *********** ******** My mom’s surgery was done 10 years back for both knees. She walked from the 3rd day itself and has had no complaints since then. I recommend him for the confidence he exudes, experience and expertise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My Sister had met with an Accident and Had a Surgery Done to her leg by Dr. Malhan and I am very happy to say that my Sister is recovering Fine. Also upon Followups the Doctor was very Attentive and explained the Minor Niggles my sister was facing after the Surgery and gave proper Solutions. We are very Happy with Dr. Malhan and would Definitely Recommend him.

Doctor gave a patience hearing to me ,then told about his observations about my knee in detail to best of my satisfaction.  I feel I can blindly recommend any one to the Dr to contact for his problems. I pray almighty for his successes in his field. May God bless him
Poor management of appointments. Waiting for ages....totally unacceptable. This can be easily be avoided
